Welcome to webgme_bindings's documentation!
===========================================

This is the API reference manual for the WebGME APIs in Python.

`Here is the documentation about how to get started with non-JavaScript APIs. <https://github.com/webgme/bindings>`_.

   :caption: Classes

   _static/util.rst
   _static/webgme.rst
   _static/exceptions.rst
